  • Constructor Details

    • PasswordCheckerUtility

      public PasswordCheckerUtility()

  • Method Details

    • getInvalidPasswords

      public static ArrayList<String> getInvalidPasswords(ArrayList<String> passwordsArray)
      Returns an ArrayList of invalid passwords from a given ArrayList of passwords. A password is considered invalid if it does not pass the isValidPassword(String) method. Each invalid password in the returned ArrayList is accompanied by the error message for why it is invalid.
      Parameters:
      passwordsArray - ArrayList of passwords to be checked for validity
      Returns:
      ArrayList of invalid passwords along with their error messages
      Throws:
      Exception - If any of the individual passwords are invalid and throw an Exception

    • comparePasswords

      public static void comparePasswords(String password, String passwordConfirm) throws UnmatchedException
      Throws an UnmatchedException if the two given passwords do not match.
      Parameters:
      password - The first password to be compared
      passwordConfirm - The second password to be compared
      Throws:
      UnmatchedException - If the two passwords do not match

    • comparePasswordsWithReturn

      public static boolean comparePasswordsWithReturn(String password, String passwordConfirm)
      Returns true if the two given passwords match, and false otherwise.
      Parameters:
      password - The first password to be compared
      passwordConfirm - The second password to be compared
      Returns:
      true if the two passwords match, false otherwise

    • isValidLength

      public static boolean isValidLength(String password) throws LengthException
      Throws a LengthException if the given password is less than 6 characters long.
      Parameters:
      password - The password to be checked for length
      Returns:
      true if the password is at least 6 characters long, false otherwise
      Throws:
      LengthException - If the password is less than 6 characters long

    • hasUpperAlpha

      public static boolean hasUpperAlpha(String password) throws NoUpperAlphaException
      Validates if the password contains at least one uppercase alphabetic character.
      Parameters:
      password - the password string to be validated
      Returns:
      true if the password contains at least one uppercase alphabetic character, false otherwise
      Throws:
      NoUpperAlphaException - if the password does not contain at least one uppercase alphabetic character

    • hasLowerAlpha

      public static boolean hasLowerAlpha(String password) throws NoLowerAlphaException
      This method checks if a given password contains at least one lowercase character.
      Parameters:
      password - the password string to be checked
      Returns:
      true if the password contains at least one lowercase character, false otherwise
      Throws:
      NoLowerAlphaException - if the password does not contain a lowercase character

    • hasDigit

      public static boolean hasDigit(String password) throws NoDigitException
      This method checks if a given password contains at least one digit.
      Parameters:
      password - the password string to be checked
      Returns:
      true if the password contains at least one digit, false otherwise
      Throws:
      NoDigitException - if the password does not contain a digit

    • hasSpecialChar

      public static boolean hasSpecialChar(String password) throws NoSpecialCharacterException
      This method checks if a given password contains at least one special character.
      Parameters:
      password - the password string to be checked
      Returns:
      true if the password contains at least one special character, false otherwise
      Throws:
      NoSpecialCharacterException - if the password does not contain a special character

    • NoSameCharInSequence

      public static boolean NoSameCharInSequence(String password) throws InvalidSequenceException
      This method checks if a given password does not contain three or more identical characters in sequence.
      Parameters:
      password - the password string to be checked
      Returns:
      true if the password does not contain three or more identical characters in sequence, false otherwise
      Throws:
      InvalidSequenceException - if the password contains three or more identical characters in sequence

    • isValidPassword

      public static boolean isValidPassword(String password) throws Exception
      This method checks if a given password is valid.
      Parameters:
      password - the password string to be checked
      Returns:
      true if the password is valid, false otherwise
      Throws:
      Exception - if the password is invalid

    • isWeakPassword

      public static boolean isWeakPassword(String passwordString) throws WeakPasswordException
      This method checks if the given password is considered weak. A password is considered weak if its length is greater than or equal to 6 and less than or equal to 9.
      Parameters:
      passwordString - the password string to be checked
      Returns:
      true if the password is weak, false otherwise
      Throws:
      WeakPasswordException - if the password is considered weak
